key_talking_points: Florida's Sam Reinhart was just penalized for tripping at 03:32 of the first period, putting Edmonton on the power play.
The score remains 5-4 in favor of Florida, but Edmonton has a chance to tie it up with the man advantage.
Reinhart has already had a shot on goal this period, so he's been active, but that penalty could be costly.
Edmonton has already scored 4 goals with 46 shots on goal. Stuart Skinner is in net for Edmonton. Sergei Bobrovsky is in net for Florida.  Both goalies are seeing a lot of rubber.
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum score is moderate with a few shots on goal and a penalty. The game is close, with Florida leading by one goal. This warrants a mixed coverage approach, balancing play-by-play with analysis of the penalty and its potential impact.

high_intensity_events.summary: Shot on goal by Sam Reinhart (FLA) at 03:26
Shot on goal by Vladimir Tarasenko (FLA) at 03:29
Penalty on Sam Reinhart (FLA) for tripping at 03:32

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Edmonton power play and whether they can capitalize to tie the game. Also, discuss Reinhart's impact on the game so far.
